alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 7:12PM CDT until August 28 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 712 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chandler, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chandler, Stroud, Davenport, Sparks, Warwick and Kendrick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
